PAD_FoundSleepers.synopsis: Player enters region where several goblins and bugbears are drunk sleeping. It is IMPORTANT for this VB to mention that making noise would wake those creatures.

PAD_FoundSleepers_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundSleepers_0.text: Looks like the booze got the better of them. They're practically unconscious.
PAD_FoundSleepers_0.context: NodeContext: Seeing bugbears and goblins passed out from drink - amused but quiet and cautious

PAD_FoundSleepers_1.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundSleepers_1.context: InternalNodeContext: A node to disconnect the next node for GP2. It doesn't have VO, and requires a certain fix to work. Leaving only the first one for now.

PAD_FoundSleepers_2.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundSleepers_2.text: Still, we best make not too much noise.
PAD_FoundSleepers_2.context: NodeContext: responding to a companion who has pointed out the sleeping monsters nearby are drunk - cautious
